website_summaries.verdict: This model stands out for its sleek black exterior and spacious interior, and is the most powerful Danby model we considered.
pros: An all-black exterior gives this unit an attractive modern look
1.2 cubic feet is large enough to accommodate virtually every common microwave use
1200 watts of cooking power means foods and beverages are heated evenly and efficiently
The dark gray interior matches nicely with the exterior
Made with Danby's XpressClean technology for easy cleanup
cons: The only one-touch key is a popcorn button, so most cooking times must be programmed manually

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Except You Can't Turn Off The Beeping
customer_reviews.text: This microwave has is everything I want in a microwave with one exception. Pros: • Quiet • Turntable is smooth • Door is easy to open (i.e. does not slide the microwave) • Has convenient 30 sec+/instant on button • Does not require you to press "time cook" or any other similar derpery to enter a time (e.g. some microwaves reserve the 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 keys for instant-on in the respective minute amounts) • Choice of 12/24 hour clock Cons: • Impossible to disable the beeping It's a fantastic microwave all in all, but without the ability to disable beeping, I have to knock a star.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Vitralis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, works great, easy to clean. Best value microwave on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Love the clean minimal look. Also practical and easy to clean. No cheap handle to break off. Works great. Update: Slow squeaking noises after a few weeks. I hope it's the turntable, although I don't see why it should squeak. Something like a microwave making abnormal sounds is always unsettling...so I downgraded to three starts in hopes Danby can respond with some advice. This shouldn't happen after 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied. It is not too loud to me.
customer_reviews.text: So far I am completely satisfied with my microwave. Other reviews have indicated it is too loud but I don't think it is. I really like how quiet it is opening and closing the door. My old one slammed shut and it really bugged me! I will add to my review if anything changes. I still love my microwave but have found one thing... It is difficult to see what's happening inside while it is working. I am used to being able to watch for my oatmeal to boil over but it is nearly dark inside my Danby. This won't change my 5-star rating though because it is about the favorite microwave of any I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: JoLyn

customer_reviews.title: Lucky to have found this!
customer_reviews.text: Great design, feels very high quality. When researching microwaves online, so many brands seem that you have to get lucky to get a model that lasts more than a year. I've used this one for 3 months so far and I have every confidence that it'll last for many, many years. Wish they made other appliances like full size fridges and dishwashers! Great value, particularly for the quality. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Sleek looking microwave
customer_reviews.text: I loved the reviews and the sleek look of the microwave. When it was delivered, the box had no damaged. When I opened the box, the microwave was damaged. Dents, dents and more dents. It was a great price. The microwave is sleek looking and I love that it doesn’t have the bulky handle to open the door. It is heavy though! The sound of the microwave isn’t loud or annoying either as other reviews said. Only disappointed is with Amazon for delivering a damaged microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Hammel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The "brushed silver" is misleading. It's not a metallic finish. It's just some industrial gray paint.
customer_reviews.author: Lasamy

customer_reviews.title: Looks Pretty in my Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this microwave over a month ago, and it works good so far. The microwave looks very sleek, and it heats food as expected. We don't use the microwave daily; we probably use it once every 3 days or so. It came with a replacement button sticker sheet; not sure if I will need it, but it is nice to have (I guess). Using the power level button on this microwave is more difficult than on my old microwave, but maybe it will be easier once I get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: PaulaTop Contributor: Cake Decorating

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1.5 years
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 1 1/2 years, and now it barely heats up a mug of water when I put it on 2 minutes. 😕 Should have lasted more than 1.5 years. Warranty is 12 months, so I guess I’m out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: J. Finn

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased it for our work break room im very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: i purchased it for our work break room im very happy with it. it showed up in a timely manner, well packaged and it works like a charm. would definitely recommend this for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Mc Coog

customer_reviews.title: Excellent microwave.
customer_reviews.text: This simplistic microwave is just what I wanted. It works much better than the previous one, a better-known brand, which cooked too fast and died early. I particularly like the good visibility of the markings on the control panel.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Short Life
customer_reviews.text: The unit worked fine until it died 3 days short of two years - well out of warranty, but come on, it should last far longer than two years.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nicol

customer_reviews.title: Just OK.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special. Thin sheet metal, no led lighting inside, turntable and coasters very flimsy and cheap. But functions well and display is very visible and simple. For that price I have seen better.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver F

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's huge and works very well, but it's a little loud.
customer_reviews.author: Caidy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was wanting - easy to use and with 1200 watts
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was wanting - easy to use and with 1200 watts. I also have another Danby product and love their quality.
customer_reviews.author: Palidrome

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, quiet, and heats very well. Love the simplicity in the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use user interface.
customer_reviews.text: So far works perfect, less noisy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shatrughna Singh

customer_reviews.title: A little DEEP depth microwave have room 4 it!
customer_reviews.text: had this about a month now. works very good gave it 4 stars because you can not see the clock when sitting down below the raised microwave in my above counter cabinet. (I used to use microwave as kitchen clock but now cant.) Also i like to set the timer for my daughter for cooking times, but after a wait of about 30 seconds with no start push it cancels that and returns to current time. pushing it 8 or 9 times for low 10% power my bother some, but im used to it as old one did same thing. For a smaller MW it sure does take up alot of depth space!
customer_reviews.author: David H. Miller

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY FOR THE BUCK
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed, it was much better than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Warren B. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Looks Pretty but....
customer_reviews.text: Product came in defective. Looks great, but did not get the chance to properly use.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Carson

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Is a very nice unit,works great and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but what good is that if it's broken within 3 months of
customer_reviews.text: Making noises 2 months after purchase. Spacious.. but what good is that if it's broken within 3 months of purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jean Zelada

customer_reviews.title: Significant defective issue.
customer_reviews.text: After getting it set up, I tried a 30 second trial with a mug of water. The microwave made loud sounds, like it had some electrical resistance, and then it tripped the circuit breaker. Note: it was plugged into the same outlet as our old unit, which was larger and never had an issue. We did not feel safe even operating this.oven.There is an obvious defect somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: L. James

customer_reviews.title: ¿Overrated watts¿
customer_reviews.text: First delivery was damaged and didn't heat properly. It was quickly replaced with one that arrived without physical damage but it still doesn't heat properly. The watt rating doesn't match the performance. I went from a much smaller rated microwave to this one and it takes twice as long to heat food and it still has cool spots. Definitely looking for a better quality microwave because this one does not suit my daily needs. I should have returned it instead of complaining here but I had already returned one and feel like you get what you pay for and that I should have known better.
customer_reviews.author: Handy Randy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for 13 months, Just died, stopped working mid reheat of lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Rohrer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It's a microwave. That's about all I can say. It's terribly loud and sounds like everything inside is rattling around. Not much more positive I can say about this. It can tell time and does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave. Arrive on the date promised and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave. Arrive on the date promised and it looks very slick.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Co.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Came to me fully broken. So broken in fact that when we tried to plug it in despite its horrible condition (bought "like new"). It shocked my mother. The microwave doesn't even turn on. Not even the clock. This is an embarrassment.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: should I be worried?
customer_reviews.text: everything works fine. great modern look. but see my pictures. there are 2 worrisome gaps in the door and side. should I be concerned? we're talking about radiation here.
customer_reviews.author: the_arrow

customer_reviews.title: Found that the door does not seat properly. Steam ...
customer_reviews.text: Found that the door does not seat properly. Steam from defrosting is seen pouring past door seal. Hinge area of door tight but closure side has movement in and out and is misaligned. Seems to be common customer complaint. Seems Danby is dumping on its online customers machines that fell off a forklift? Return/exchange is going to be a hassle-I think I will simply junk it and buy a machine I can inspect from local appliance dealer. Also, I did not receive shipping invoice, only instruction manual, which leads me to believe return of my money or an exchange is not worth my time to process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish microwave!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very stylish microwave that was a gorgeous addition to our kitchen. This 1.2 cubic Danby stainless steel and black microwave is sleek and functional. I really love the minimalistic features and options. "Popcorn" is the only pre-set food programing... I mean, do you ever need anything else?! I also really love the "add 30" button to quickly get the microwave going. The inside is not your typical stainless finish. It is a dark gray with almost a "non-stick" ceramic feel which has been a breeze to clean so far. *see pics. Overall, I'm really pleased!
customer_reviews.author: LiliBelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave at a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: - This is a truly great-looking and well-designed microwave. I find it easy to use and the interior seems large, given the standard footprint. - This is not the quiet-est microwave I have ever owned, but it is NOT obnoxiously noisy. - Other reviewers have said that the light is weak and the interior seems dark. Well, that's true! I didn't think I'd care about that, but, yea, that does bug me. - I don't think we've ever had a Danby product and this seems well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Theseus

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and great price
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this microwave. Our previous microwave was small and only 700 watts. It would take forever to heat things up. This one heats things up twice as quickly, is very roomy (I can fit all of my plates inside no matter the size), and is very attractive. It is easy to clean, so far all I've needed is a wet sponge. It is fairly quiet and does not beep excessively (our previous microwave beeped even when I was opening the door. We've had it for about a week and I see it lasting for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Loves those books

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied with the microwave oven even though it arrived with ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied with the microwave oven even though it arrived with parts missing - the plastic ring that goes under the glass turntable and supports the turntable so it wont wobble or tilt like it does now. I saved enough on the price that I'll buy a ring to fit it. It also had a slight indentation (or dent) on the side near the back. Again, its not enough to make me want to send it back and what can you expect for $63. It works alright and looks nice, so I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Schlegel

customer_reviews.title: A modern design microwave with energy saving features
customer_reviews.text: This is a clean looking design that goes in any modern new kitchen. Controls are easy to use and understand, a large digital display is easy to read and also gives the time. At 1200 watts this microwave has plenty of power, the turntable helps prevent hot spots and evenly distributes radio waves. A popcorn button cycles power just right so most all of the popcorn pops without burning, a welcome feature. Stand-by power use is less than 1 watt. Overall this microwave does a good job, looks great and has the latest energy saving features built-in features.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Good Microwave, Bad Color
customer_reviews.text: First note, this is a full sized microwave (check product page dimensions). The one I received was white, I would get it black or silver as white shows dirt, fingerprints, etc.. Beyond this, this is a very nice microwave that is easy to use. It also heats up frozen foods nicely using the given times on the packaging. As with all new microwaves it has a carousel table to automatically rotate the item being heated up. For the price it is a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Mania

customer_reviews.title: Dark Interior and Weak Light
customer_reviews.text: Why only 3 stars? Primarily because the interior on the model I received is dark gray and the interior light is very weak--this makes it almost impossible to see the food through the window. Perhaps in time I will get used to that--but right now it is very annoying not being able to see much through the window. Other than that--the oven is well built and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Sharp...!
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is not one that is bulky and takes up a lot of space. It leaves room if you were putting it on the counter below some cabinets instead of being too tall. It also seems like it is durable and would last a longtime. I would happily recommend this microwave to anyone else looking for one. The write up mentions the interior space and it is a nice amount to space for cooling!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Danby is Delightful
customer_reviews.text: Danby microwave is a good large size with clean lines. I like the simple modern look. The numbers are large and this is easy to use with 1200 watts, which is more power than my last microwave. My favorite part is the dark grey interior that is easy to clean. Top it all off with a reasonable price and you have a winner.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Danby Nouveau Microwave
customer_reviews.text: This microwave was the perfect upgrade for me, such volume inside for nuking large portions. It's a very easy to use microwave, simplistic functions, and finally, an accurate popcorn button. It also looks fantastic on my counter, not taking up nearly as much space as I expected being so much larger than my previous microwave. Just fantastic all around.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Deathwish

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works good
customer_reviews.text: I have a small place so I really should have taken the specs on size into more consideration as it is a big microwave unit. That said, the Danby 1.2 cu.ft. Nouveau Wave Microwave Oven is a nice looking and easy to use microwave. I have a small size Danby microwave that I really like and that's why I selected this one to try. It is actually an easier unit to try. My household is split on the door opener. I like it but my son remembers one of our old micros where the button broke so opening it could be annoying. That was his only minus on the unit. Otherwise, it looks good and works good.
customer_reviews.author: sanoe.net

customer_reviews.title: The inside is super large, so I also agree with others
customer_reviews.text: The appearance to me doesnt scream fancy or high end.. but its very straight up and to the point.. Its a microwave, so it has all the standard features. Altho for me I dont think the defroster works nearly as well as the Panasonic micros I have had! It just doesnt seem to be nearly as efficient.. I do agree its much much quieter than other micros and especially my Panasonic unit i had. The inside is super large, so I also agree with others. Theres some weird self clean internal thing but i have no idea why it is.. Danby doesnt explain it! Ive never heard of the brand before, at all... but i would buy em again.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: At first we hesitated with this microwave as we had never heard of "Danby" before and usually go with brand names we know and have experience with when getting appliances. I was more eager to try it than my husband was but I can say now that we both are very pleased with this microwave. The inside is SO easy to clean and that's a huge factor for me. He loves the shape and design. I love that the bell is loud enough to hear but doesn't wake the dead at 2:00 in the morning! It has enough power to heat quickly and it doesn't get any better than that. Don't hesitate with this one. It's just awesome!
customer_reviews.author: MommaMia

customer_reviews.title: Very classy
customer_reviews.text: I received this product for free for my unbiased and honest opinion. I was not paid for this. I was hoping this was a smaller model but nope it is huge and pretty heavy. I love the dials and the clock. I love the sleek look and that it does not collect finger prints. I love the 24 hour clock too. UPDATE:. Still going strong after this many months... Still looks sleek even when filthy.. easy to clean.. it is a keeper...
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We really like this microwave. We had a smaller less powerful microwave before and it is so much nicer to use this one. When we make popcoren almost every kernal pops and none have burned. Things are nice and hot after only a minute or so. When we make frozen meals they are heated all the way through and you don't need to put them back in. The microwave is easy to use. Very straight forward and no guessing.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Detweiler

customer_reviews.title: Although it works fine.
customer_reviews.text: The unit was knocked around in the carton. You can t see, what going on inside the unit because the light is very low wattage. They should have used a lighter color on the inside. Although it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lou LoBraico

product_meta.title: Danby DMW14A4SDB Nouveau Wave Microwave Oven with 1.4 cu. ft. Capacity in Brushed Silver
product_meta.description: Size:1.4 cu.ft.| Color:SilverThe Nouveau Wave Danby39s exclusive microwave oven offers 14 cu ft interior capacity It features 1200 watts cooking power 10 power levels push-button door XpressClean interior and energy saving option This high-quality microwave oven also features a ...
feature_bullets: Durable and Stylish Brushed Silver Exterior
Simple One Touch Cooking for Popcorn

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars83 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
